title: What if your town....?
creator_credit: Barry Pierce and Tasmanian Film Corporation
brief_description: This film shows how to set up a “mutual aid” plan, which is a system of self-help whereby members of an industrial estate can pool their disaster and fire fighting resources for their mutual benefit.
